trans-unit.source: Defines the methods, properties, and events for all HTML server control elements not represented by a specific .NET Framework class.
trans-unit.target: 定義方法、 屬性和事件的所有 HTML 伺服器控制項項目不是由特定的.NET Framework 類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to represent an HTML server control element not directly represented by a .NET Framework class, such as `<span>`, `<div>`, `<body>`, or `<font>`.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個類別來表示 HTML 伺服器控制項項目不是直接的.NET Framework 類別表示，例如`<span>`， `<div>`， `<body>`，或`<font>`。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlGenericControl, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 HtmlGenericControl 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133) and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)和[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl"></xref>類別具有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl> class using the default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl>類別使用的預設值。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl>

trans-unit.source: It is commonly used to dynamically create a server-side `<span>` element.
trans-unit.target: 它通常用來動態建立伺服器端`<span>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |`TagName`|The "span" literal string.|
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl"></xref> class with the specified tag.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl"></xref>具有指定標記的類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl> class using the specified tag.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl>類別使用指定的標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to dynamically create any HTML server control element not directly represented by a .NET Framework class.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您動態建立不是直接由.NET Framework 類別任何 HTML 伺服器控制項項目。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |`TagName`|The value of the `tag` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > If the `tag` parameter is `null`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl.TagName%2A> property is set to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |`TagName`|值`tag`參數。 | > [!NOTE] > 如果`tag`參數是`null`，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl.TagName%2A>屬性會設定為<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl.TagName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the element for which this instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: 類別的這個執行個體建立的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the HTML element represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所代表的 HTML 項目的名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlGenericControl"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to programmatically determine the element name of the HTML server control.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式判斷 HTML 伺服器控制項的項目名稱中使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, the TagName property for a server-side `<span id="MySpan" runat= "server"/>` element contains the value "span".
trans-unit.target: 例如，伺服器端的 TagName 屬性`<span id="MySpan" runat= "server"/>`項目包含值 「 範圍 」。

trans-unit.source: The tag name of an element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的標記名稱。
